00019     void CHCTraversal::onTree(PagingLandScapeOctree& node) const 
00020     {
00021         #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00022             assert (node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible);
00023                     occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;       
00024         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00025                 
00026         if (!node.mNodes.empty())
00027         {       
00028             PagingLandScapeOctreeNodeList::iterator it =  node.mNodes.begin();  
00029             while (it != node.mNodes.end())
00030             { 
00031                 stack.push (*it);
00032                 ++it;
00033             }
00034         }
00035 
00036         PagingLandScapeOctree *n = 
00037             node.mChildren[ 0 ][ 0 ][ 0 ];
00038         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00039            stack.push(n);
00040         n = node.mChildren[ 1 ][ 0 ][ 0 ];
00041         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00042             stack.push(n);
00043         n = node.mChildren[ 0 ][ 1 ][ 0 ];
00044         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00045             stack.push(n);
00046         n = node.mChildren[ 1 ][ 1 ][ 0 ];
00047         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00048             stack.push(n);
00049         n = node.mChildren[ 0 ][ 0 ][ 1 ];
00050         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00051             stack.push(n);
00052         n = node.mChildren[ 1 ][ 0 ][ 1 ];
00053         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00054             stack.push(n);
00055         n = node.mChildren[ 0 ][ 1 ][ 1 ];
00056         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00057             stack.push(n);
00058         n = node.mChildren[ 1 ][ 1 ][ 1 ];
00059         if (n && n->hasChildren())  
00060             stack.push(n);
00061         }
00062     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00063     void CHCTraversal::onLeaf(PagingLandScapeOctreeNode& n) const 
00064     {
00065                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00066             assert (n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible);
00067             assert (n.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible);
00068                     occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00069         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00070         if (!n.isOccluder() || mIsNotSolidScene)
00071                         occlusion.queueDraw (n);
00072         }
